DOC.brief_summary: This research study look compare effect two uniquely different power training intervention ( high force , low velocity versus low force , high velocity ) change mobility status among old individual risk mobility disability .
DOC.brief_title: Lower Extremity Muscle Function Elderly : Study 2
DOC.criteria: Male Female 7085 yr Community dwell Short Performance Battery Score > 9 BMI range 1932 kg/m2 Willingness randomize come laboratory 20 week . Acute Terminal Illness MI previous 6 month , symptomatic coronary artery disease congestive heart failure . Upper Lower extremity fracture previous 6 month Uncontrolled hypertension ( 150/90mmHg ) Neuromuscular disease drug affect neuromuscular function Hormone replacement therapy Participation regular endurance resistance training exercise previous 3 month
